name: bnj1212
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
-| wss(c1, c0)
-| wi(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
-| wss(c1, c0)
-| wi(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1))

body.origin:
|- wss(c1, c0)
-| wceq(c1, crab(s0, c0, w1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1))
-| wceq(c1, crab(s0, c0, w1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1))
-| wb(w0, w3a(w2, wcel(cv(s0), c1), w3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
-| wceq(c1, crab(s0, c0, w1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| wb(w0, w3a(w2, wcel(cv(s0), c1), w3))

comment: First-order logic and set theory. (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)
